data.title: Thailand, Germany launch TGC EMC project to drive toward Net Zero goals
data.description: Eight agencies have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) under the Thai-German Cooperation on Energy, Mobility and Climate (TGC EMC) to formally demonstrate their commitment to collaboration on supporting Thailand’s climate goals.

data.title: Macbook crowned Thailand’s top brand in 2024 Superfans Survey
data.description: Iconic laptop beats competition from Dettol shower gel and HP computers

data.title: Thailand’s Festival of Lights
data.description: A part of Thai culture for centuries, Loy Krathong will be celebrated on Nov 15 and is based on the lunar calendar ritual of releasing illuminated lotus-shaped floats or krathongs on rivers and waterways. It also pays homage to the water goddess, apart from being a time to reflect, express gratitude and make a wish for good fortune. Guru By Bangkok Post  lists a few places to join in the celebrations.

data.title: Anantara Siam Welcomes Michelin-Star Chef Residency at Biscotti
data.description: This season, Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel’s renowned Italian restaurant, Biscotti, unveils an exclusive chef residency, welcoming Italy’s celebrated Cristina Bowerman from the Michelin-starred Glass Hostaria in Rome. From 6th November to 30th December 2024, Bangkok diners will have the rare chance to experience Chef Bowerman’s contemporary Italian cuisine, redefining traditional fare with a creative twist that reflects her passion for cultural heritage, memory, and innovation.

data.title: New releases for your streaming pleasure: Nov 6-12
data.description: Looking for a title to binge-watch this weekend? Here

data.title: North Korean troops enter Ukraine fight for 1st time, many killed
data.description: KYIV — North Korean troops have entered the fight in Russia

data.title: ‘Harmony World Puppet Innovation Festival’ gets underway next week
data.description: Puppeteers from Australia, Turkey, Mexico, Indonesia, Laos and Myanmar will join troupes from Thailand in highlighting wildlife extinction

data.title: New master’s programmes to take tech education to a new level
data.description: Kasikorn Business-Technology Group partners with three leading universities to prepare the workforce of the future

data.title: Phothalai Debuts Track Man 4 with Southeast Asia’s First Virtual Golf Tournament
data.description: Phothalai Leisure Park Co., Ltd., led by CEO and Founder Mr. Anan Tavisaengsiri, has introduced the state-of-the-art Track Man 4 system at Phothalai Golf Driving Range, enhancing the range to an 18-hole course standard. This launch coincides with the "Phothalai – Singha Thailand PGA Virtual Golf Tournament 2024," Southeast Asia’s first virtual golf tournament, supported by the Professional Golf Association of Thailand and Boon Rawd Brewery Co., Ltd.

data.title: Thai businesses urged to prepare for new round of US-China trade war
data.description: With both Harris and Trump promising to raise tariffs, Thai businesses must prepare for fallout as US-China trade war intensifies

data.title: Philippines approves purchase of 40 patrol boats amid China spat
data.description: MANILA — The Philippines has approved the purchase of 40 fast patrol craft worth 25.8 billion pesos (US$441 million), seeking to bolster maritime security as tensions with Beijing in the South China Sea linger.

data.title: Adding two new managers for THAI rehabilitation plan is ‘necessary’
data.description: Finance Ministry dismisses concerns its decision risks politicising the national airline while setting lower price for rights offering

data.title: Thai sci-fi series set to premiere on Netflix
data.description: Explore the possibilities of a futuristic and tech-driven Thailand with Tomorrow And I on Netflix. This upcoming Thai anthology drama features four distinct episodes, each exploring pressing issues that stretch the imagination.

data.title: Results of national exit poll on US presidential election
data.description: NEW YORK - Democrat Kamala Harris faced Republican Donald Trump on Tuesday in the United States presidential election, after the two candidates vied for support by staking positions on issues including abortion, the economy and foreign policy.

data.title: Hoax bomb threats linked to Russia target polling places in battleground states, FBI says
data.description: ATLANTA: Hoax bomb threats, many of which appeared to originate from Russian email domains, were directed at polling locations in three battleground states - Georgia, Michigan and Wisconsin - as Election Day voting was underway, the FBI said on Tuesday.

data.title: The detective's toolkit
data.description: Although you may have never read or watched the well-known Japanese manga, animation and movie Detective Conan, you probably have heard famous quotes from the animation such as, "there is always only one truth", or "my dad taught me when we were in Hawaii".

data.title: US expects foreign adversaries to stoke anger over election results
data.description: WASHINGTON — Russia continued to push out disinformation to undermine faith in the United States election Tuesday, but American officials said they were bracing for an even bigger assault of false narratives in the days and weeks after the vote.

data.title: Harris voters driven by democracy; Trump supporters by inflation, immigration
data.description: Voters for Kamala Harris and Donald Trump who cast their ballots for Tuesday’s presidential election had vastly different motivations — reflecting a broader national divide on the problems the United States faces.

data.title: ChatGPT search: Kaspersky urges users to click links with caution
data.description: OpenAI recently introduced ChatGPT search, a new web search tool integrated into its existing interface. It is a useful feature; however, just like with traditional search, users should exercise caution when clicking on links suggested by the chatbot.

data.title: Lao People’s Revolutionary Party calls for action to address economic woes
data.description: Party Secretary General Thongloun Sisoulith (pic) has called for strong action to address the country’s economic problems, saying that these issues can no longer remain unresolved.
